entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Telephone Election 2002/2. The voting preferences of the adult population before the second round of the 2002 Hungarian parliamentary elections.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F32: TÁRKI Telephone Election 2002/2. The voting preferences of the adult population before the second round of the 2002 Hungarian parliamentary elections.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Gazsó, Tibor
Kolosi, Tamás
Tóth, István György
entry.dcterms:description: party preferences, voting behavior in the first and second round, evaluation of Prime Minister candidates, voting intentions
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
entry.dcterms:coverage: the Parliamentary electoral districts of Hungary where there was a second round in 2002
entry.dcterms:subject: person
survey data
cross-section

Random sample stratified by settlement type, composed of households with subscription to regular telephones. At the household belonging to the selected telephone number, the person who had their birthday closest after the date of the interview was selected to be interviewed.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
D (after 2007-05-01: A)
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
